<h3 id="X36970">X(36970) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: REFLECTIONS-OF-X(16)-IN-(A,B,C) TO PEDAL-OF-X(16)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6+5*(b^2+c^2)*a^4-2*(2*b^4-3*b^2*c^2+2*c^4)*a^2-2*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)-2*sqrt(3)*S*(3*a^4-2*b^4+4*b^2*c^2-2*c^4)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(36970) = 3*X(2)-4*X(33561) = 3*X(14)-2*X(395) = 5*X(14)-4*X(11543) = 4*X(14)-3*X(16268) = 7*X(14)-5*X(16961) = 5*X(14)-3*X(16963) = 3*X(14)-X(36968) = 3*X(16)-4*X(395) = X(16)-4*X(5321) = 5*X(16)-8*X(11543) = 2*X(16)-3*X(16268) = 7*X(16)-10*X(16961) = 5*X(16)-6*X(16963) = X(16)+2*X(19107) = 3*X(16)-2*X(36968) = X(395)-3*X(5321) = 5*X(395)-6*X(11543) = 8*X(395)-9*X(16268) = 14*X(395)-15*X(16961) = 10*X(395)-9*X(16963) = 2*X(395)+3*X(19107)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(16)</p>
<p>X(36970) lies on these lines:
{2,10645}, {4,13}, {5,5238}, {6,3830}, {14,16}, {15,381}, {17,546}, {18,20}, {62,382}, {148,530}, {202,12943}, {203,3583}, {299,316}, {376,16242}, {383,5479}, {396,3845}, {397,3853}, {398,3627}, {473,14165}, {511,13102}, {524,35693}, {533,622}, {542,23005}, {547,33417}, {549,16967}, {576,13103}, {616,34508}, {617,624}, {621,3643}, {623,11299}, {1503,36962}, {1539,36208}, {1656,5352}, {1657,5237}, {1992,35752}, {2043,3367}, {2044,3366}, {2307,18514}, {3096,3642}, {3106,22693}, {3107,31702}, {3146,5343}, {3200,13352}, {3201,10540}, {3206,6759}, {3364,23251}, {3365,23261}, {3389,18586}, {3390,18587}, {3411,33703}, {3412,3861}, {3524,33416}, {3534,10646}, {3543,5334}, {3545,16966}, {3585,7005}, {3734,11295}, {3839,16962}, {3843,22236}, {3850,16772}, {3851,36836}, {5055,11480}, {5066,23302}, {5073,22238}, {5076,5340}, {5318,15687}, {5350,12102}, {5367,15679}, {5460,35932}, {5463,22491}, {5464,31694}, {5469,6108}, {5613,6780}, {5663,36980}, {6105,35470}, {6411,35735}, {6774,21159}, {6779,6782}, {6785,31708}, {7006,12953}, {7685,30559}, {7752,30471}, {7804,11296}, {7859,11303}, {8352,12154}, {8703,23303}, {8739,35480}, {9117,22797}, {9761,32479}, {10635,18564}, {10642,18559}, {10657,10706}, {10733,36209}, {11001,11489}, {11078,16771}, {11481,15681}, {11485,14269}, {11486,15684}, {11542,14893}, {11586,15609}, {12101,12816}, {13754,36981}, {14915,30440}, {15704,16773}, {16002,20426}, {16118,33654}, {17800,36843}, {18470,18561}, {21467,30468}, {22490,35303}, {22795,22892}, {22997,23013}, {22999,23022}, {23007,23017}, {29012,36758}, {33603,33606}, {35690,35751}, {36759,36992}, {36964,36994}</p>
<p>
X(36970) = midpoint of X(14) and X(19107)<br>
X(36970) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (13, 31710), (14, 5321), (16, 14), (383, 5479), (617, 624), (3107, 31702), (5464, 31694), (6779, 6782), (20426, 16002), (35932, 5460), (36968, 395)<br>
X(36970) = anticomplement of the anticomplement of X(33561)<br>
X(36970) = intersection, other than A,B,C, of conics {{A, B, C, X(4), X(36210)}} and {{A, B, C, X(13), X(10218)}}<br>
X(36970) = crosspoint of X(14) and X(12816)<br>
X(36970) = crosssum of X(16) and X(10645)<br>
X(36970) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 36967, 10645), (4, 10654, 13), (4, 16964, 61), (6, 3830, 36969), (13, 10654, 61), (13, 16964, 10654), (14, 16, 16268), (14, 15442, 36210), (14, 16963, 11543), (14, 36968, 395), (18, 20, 5351), (376, 18581, 16242), (382, 5339, 62), (395, 36968, 16), (396, 3845, 16808), (398, 3627, 16965), (5321, 19107, 16), (12817, 36967, 16809), (16809, 36967, 2), (22512, 25164, 14)<br>
</p>
